name: Blue Deck
unlock: Discover at least 20 items from your collection.

name: Yellow Deck
unlock: Discover at least 50 items from your collection.

name: Green Deck
description: At end of each Round: +$2 per remaining Hand. +$1 per remaining Discard. -Earn no Interest.
unlock: Discover at least  75 items from your collection.

name: Black Deck
description: +1 Joker slot, but -1 hand every round.
unlock: Discover at least 100 items from your collection.

name: Magic Deck
description: Start run with the Crystal Ball voucher and 2 copies of The Fool.
unlock: Win a run with the Red Deck on any difficulty.

name: Nebula Deck
description: Start run with the Telescope voucher but -1 consumable slot.
unlock: Win a run with the Blue Deck on any difficulty.

name: Ghost Deck
description: Spectral cards may appear individually in the shop, and you start with a Hex card.
unlock: Win a run with the Yellow Deck on any difficulty.

name: Abandoned Deck
description: Start run with no Face Cards in your deck.
unlock: Win a run with the Green deck on any difficulty.

name: Checkered Deck
description: Start run with 26 Spades and 26 Hearts in deck.
unlock: Win a run with the Black Deck on any difficulty.

name: Zodiac Deck
description: Start run with Tarot Merchant, Planet Merchant, Overstock.
unlock: Win a run with any deck on the Red Stake difficulty or harder.

name: Painted Deck
unlock: Win a run with any deck on the Green Stake difficulty or harder.

name: Anaglyph Deck
description: After defeating each Boss Blind, gain a Double Tag.
unlock: Win a run with any deck on the Black Stake difficulty or harder.

name: Plasma Deck
description: Balance Chips and Mult when calculating score for played hand X2 base Blind size.
unlock: Win a run with any deck on the Blue Stake difficulty or harder.

name: Erratic Deck
description: All Ranks and Suits in deck are randomized.
unlock: Win a run with any deck on the Orange Stake difficulty or harder.
